thread.title_full: Man of steel barely flinches as huge wave crashes on top of him

author: tmeyjes
title: Man of steel barely flinches as huge wave crashes on top of him
text:
The Manly ferry was swamped by monster waves in Sydney Harbour (Picture: Instagram/Haig Gilchrist) The moment monster waves swamped a ferry as it tried to cross Sydney Harbour have been captured in an incredible set of photos. 
The pictures show the horrendous conditions faced by the Manly ferry as stormy weather sent huge walls of water crashing over its side.
Woman who grew up with Westboro Baptist Church explains why she left The image above was captured by deckhand Haig Gilchrist as the ferry travelled through a three to four metre swell that has also created massive offshore waves for surfers.
Video footage taken on board another vessel shows the ship’s bow almost disappearing under water as it makes its way across the harbour.
But the stormy weather has come with a warning after two men drowned in separate incidents near the city.
East Coast Low must developing and the swell. #coastalwatch #sydneyheads #manlyferryride #lovemanly #mvfreshwater #manlyferryview #sydneyweather #eastcoastlow #beyondthewharf #9weather

The images are just some of a number taken by the deckhand showing the ferry tackle difficult conditions in the harbour.
One taken a few weeks ago again shows the ferry disappearing under large swell..
